info.title: Card List
info.description:
Fusion uses states to notify the operational status of cards. A cardâ€™s lifecycle consists of the following states:
Active

Card is fully operational and can be used for all the purposes it is issued for-ATM withdrawals, POS payments, e-commerce transactions, and so on.
Inactive

Card, and all future transactions on it, are temporarily blocked. If you detect fraudulent transactions on the card, deactivate it to avoid further misuse. Inactive cards can be activated again.
Canceled

Card, and all future transactions on it, are permanently blocked. Canceled cards cannot be activated again. A new/replacement card must be ordered.
